enWisdom: A person is [gauged] by his faith
Faith is the path with manifest inner secrets
Faith is a flame that cannot be extinguished
Faith is the better of the two trusts (or securities)

Wisdom: أَقْرَبُ النَّاسِ مِنَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَحْسَنُهُمْ إِيمَاناً
enWisdom: The closest people to Allah, the Glorified, are the ones with the greatest faith

Wisdom: إِنَّ مَحَلَّ الْإِيمَانِ الْجَنَانُ وَسَبِيلُهُ الْأُذُنَانِ [الْأَذَانُ‏]
enWisdom: Indeed the place of faith is the heart, and the path to it is [through] the ears
The height of religion is faith [and conviction]

Wisdom: قَدْ أَوْجَبَ الْإِيمَانَ عَلَى مُعْتَقَدِهِ إِقَامَةُ سُنَنِ الْإِسْلَامِ وَالْفَرْضِ
enWisdom: Faith has made it incumbent on its possessor to establish the traditions of Islam and its ordinances
One who entertains doubt in his faith [in one God] becomes a polytheist

Wisdom: مَا آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ مَنْ سَكَنَ الشَّكُّ قَلْبَهُ
enWisdom: He in whose heart doubt has settled does not believe in Allah
There is no honour higher than faith

Wisdom: لَا نَجَاةَ لِمَنْ لَا إِيمَانَ لَهُ
enWisdom: There is no salvation for one who has no faith

Wisdom: لَا شَيْ‏ءَ يَذْخُرُهُ الْإِنْسَانُ كَالْإِيمَانِ بِاللَّهِ وَصَنَائِعِ الْإِحْسَانِ
enWisdom: Nothing that is preserved by human beings is like faith in Allah and good deeds
Islam is in need of faith

Wisdom: قَالَ ع فِي ذِكْرِ الْمَلَائِكَةِ هُمْ أُسَرَاءُ إِيمَانٍ لَمْ يَفُكَّهُمْ مِنْهُ زَيْغٌ وَلَا عُدُولٌ
enWisdom: He (‘a) said about angels: They are captives of faith; neither divergence nor deviation breaks them from its hold
